page.title: 11Heolgerrig Local News
page.content: Lately in our small village,there has been a lot going on,an elderly man has been attacked in his home,on the Winchfawr Road, the attacker got away. An incident took place between two girls on Tuesday night the 4.6.85.,CarolAnn Williams aged 8 fell into an old swimmingpool when they were playing,Mandy Stevenson saved Carolanns life,by holding out a long stick,and pulled her to the side.Carolann is lucky to be alive. A dumped car has been found up the tip at the bottom of Brondeg,there is a Â£50 reward,the model of the car is a Viva. The local school canteen has now been completed the school dinners are now much better because they are now bieing cooked on the premises. That is the local news of this small village of Heolgerrig.
